conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: extruded walls with thickness, angled camera, visible wall top/side faces, and ceiling/roof removed to expose interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Convincing 3D extrusion and cutaway; interior volume reads well. Minor issues: some corners/joins feel simplified and a few wall tops appear uneven/soft, reducing geometric crispness.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall footprint and some major partitions (central core/stair zone, large open areas) loosely resemble the 2D plan, but several room shapes/proportions and adjacencies appear altered. The top-right zone reads like a bedroom in 3D, while the 2D plan indicates a playroom; pantry/closet/WC placement and small-room geometry are not clearly faithful.

interior_elements.notes: Basic block furniture exists (tables/blocks, a bed-like element), but kitchen/bath fixtures from the 2D plan are not clearly or correctly represented (sink/stove/toilet/vanity are ambiguous), and room-appropriate placement is inconsistent with the plan labels.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render and readable massing; walls/floors are distinguishable. However, lighting/material sameness and soft edges make openings (doors/windows) and fine partitions hard to verify precisely.

detected_errors.description: Layout fidelity issues: multiple room shapes/proportions and some adjacencies do not clearly match the 2D plan (notably the top-right room identity and central small-room/pantry/closet organization).
Doors/windows/openings are not clearly shown or are difficult to confirm on the correct walls compared to the 2D plan.
Furniture/fixtures are simplified and do not reliably correspond to the labeled functions (kitchen/bath elements unclear).
Uniform material and soft rendering reduce the ability to verify precise wall edges and openings.

summary: A valid 3D cutaway conversion is present, but the generated model shows notable plan-to-model layout/room-function mismatches and insufficiently verifiable doors/windows/fixtures.
